item.title: Web application based on Flask
item.description: Build a blogging website using Flask Flask Flask is a micro web framework written in Python. It is classified as a microframework because it does not require particular tools or libraries. It has no database abstraction layer, form validation, or any other components where pre-existing third-party libraries provide common functions. Objective To build website where a user can make account, make posts and upload photos as a profile picture.
